column5: The passenger side front window got broken last nite.  2000  Jetta. I would like to get this fixed today.  Any sudjestions?	Park lawn and QE area.   Thanks.
Apple auto glass has 24 hour service I think
Thanks HT apple is 24hrs   price  302 + tax.  Cookstown auto parts  75 for the glass. So guess what Im doing today. No fishing for me!  Rackin frackin stupid people and cars!!!
I've got a passenger side window if you need one.  $40..
2002 front passanger  Jetta  ?  If so pm me. pls.  Thanks.
All MKIV Jettas from 99.5-03 share the same windows   So yes, I have something that will fit your car without issues.
